info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 30581
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.agence-cohesion-territoires.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 30581
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.agence-cohesion-territoires.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; ANSWER SECTION:
www.agence-cohesion-territoires.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	CNAME	prod1-datar-cger-anct.integra.fr.

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
integra.fr.	1800	IN	SOA	ns1.integra.fr. dnsmaster.asa.integra.fr. 2015061880 21600 3600 3024000 3600

info.name: Missing Subresource Integrity
author: lucky0x0d
pulsesecurity.co.nz
info.description: Checks if script tags within the HTML response have Subresource Integrity implemented via the integrity attribute

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.agence-cohesion-territoires.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Cache-Control: must-revalidate, no-cache, private Content-Language: fr Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Date: Thu, 04 Jan 2024 22:36:35 GMT Expires: Sun, 19 Nov 1978 05:00:00 GMT Link: ; rel="canonical" Permissions-Policy: interest-cohort=() Server: Apache Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=63072000 X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Drupal-Cache: HIT X-Drupal-Dynamic-Cache: MISS X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Generator: Drupal 9 (https://www.drupal.org) X-Powered-By: PHP/7.3.33 X-Ua-Compatible: IE=edge Accueil | Agence nationale de la cohésion des territoires ANCT

Communiqué de Presse

Hiver 2023 : départ imminent vers les pistes de ski pour les jeunes de Sarcelles

L'Agence nationale de la cohésion des territoires (ANCT) et l'Agence nationale pour les chèques-vacances (ANCV) s’associent pour soutenir un séjour au ski porté par l’association Sol Culture dans le cadre du programme Explore Europe.

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.agence-cohesion-territoires.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently Connection: close Content-Length: 252 Content-Type: text/html; charset=iso-8859-1 Date: Thu, 04 Jan 2024 22:36:40 GMT Location: https://agence-cohesion-territoires.gouv.fr/ Server: Apache 301 Moved Permanently

Moved Permanently

The document has moved here.
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: www.agence-cohesion-territoires.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'http://www.agence-cohesion-territoires.gouv.fr/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
